name.namePart: Dr. J. G. de Roulhac Hamilton
name.displayForm: Dr. J. G. de Roulhac Hamilton

mods.abstract: Long at the center of inquiry into the history and culture of the American South, the Southern Historical Collection (SHC) is a vast collection of distinct archival collections. These collections are comprised of unique primary documents, such as diaries, journals, letters, correspondence, photographs, maps, drawings, ledgers, oral histories, moving images, albums, scrapbooks, and literary manuscripts.
